types.name: party
types.description: Fireworks intended for recreational use during holiday celebrations

types.name: high explosives
types.description: The disruptive effect of the reaction makes these explosives valuable as a bursting charge but precludes their use as a low-explosive propellant

types.name: low explosives
types.description: Low explosives are mostly solid combustible materials that decompose rapidly but do not normally detonate

types.name: boosters
types.description: An explosive booster is a sensitive explosive charge that acts as a bridge between a (relatively weak) conventional detonator and a low-sensitivity (but typically high-energy)
